property.name: Card Text
property.value: *Reveal this card when you play a Pre-match Feud. Cannot be packed by Doink, or when you are not packing a Pre-match Feud. You cannot play non-Superstar-specific Pre-match Objects, and your non-'Politics' Feud cannot be blanked by non-'Shenanigans' effects.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: *Reveal this card when High-Flying Style is put into your Ring. Cannot be packed by Doink, or when packing Cruiserweight Style Action or Lumberjack Match. This card is considered Superstar-specific. Your Springboard counts as From the Top Rope and From the Middle Turnbuckle for your effects, replace 'played card' with 'played card, or as a Counter' in its text, your opponent cannot play Backlash reversals to it, and if your next card played would be a High Risk, ignore 'Can only be played after...' in its text. When they play a card that would move Ringside cards, you may hide this card and then their card is considered Roll Out of The Ring for your printed High Risk Reversal card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Doink, or when packing Back to Basics or Great Technical Prowess. Arsenal Search 10 non-Unique printed 'Precision' maneuvers, and put them under this card; if you do not, hide this card. At the end of the Pre-match phase, choose 1 card under this card without 'reversed' in the text, put it into your hand, and Recover the other cards. When you move your Hand or Arsenal cards for the effect of your played printed 'Precision' maneuver without 'reversed' in the text, and that maneuver is unsuccessful, you may either Bury #- Ringside cards or draw #- cards, where # = number of cards moved -1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Doink, or when packing non-Superstar-specific non-'Textbook' maneuvers. When packing this card, you may pack 'Textbook' maneuvers as if they are not Multi. When you play a 'Textbook' maneuver, ignore 'Can be reversed...', and you are considered a Superstar listed in its text. Your opponent must discard 2 cards to play RMS reversals to your 'Textbook' maneuvers.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your BASH Pre-match do not take up Ring slots. ACE: When your opponent plays a non-Superstar-specific Unique maneuver, you may discard 2 cards and then their card is considered non-Unique for your reversal cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed with SAVE_US.X29. When Calgary, Alberta, Canada is in your Ring, and you would search your Arsenal for the Chain trait, you may instead Bury 2- Ringside non-Reversal cards; when you would move Ringside cards to Arsenal for Calgary, Alberta, Canada, you may instead Arsenal Search 1 non-Unique non-Superstar-specific printed F: 5- Chain card. When Calgary, Alberta, Canada is not in your Ring and your Chain maneuver is successful, Bury 1- Ringside cards; before each of your Draw Segments, you may put Flawless Transition from any non-Ring area into your Backlash (your effects cannot move that card from your Ring).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when Blaze of Glory is revealed. Packed: replace 'Mid-match Superstar-specific and Reversal' with 'Superstar-specific and Mid-match' on your All Together Now, and you can pack He's on Fire!, Heated Exchange, and Nuclear Heat in addition to your other Pre-match cards; you cannot pack 'Diego' cards. Your opponent cannot Activate non-Superstar-specific reversal effects, or play non-Superstar-specific reversals of D: #+, to your non-Unique printed Heat maneuvers played from Ringside (# = number of your Ring Heat maneuvers +1.)

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. When your opponent RFG Ringside cards for the Volley trait, you may choose 1 of those cards, put it in their Ringside, and RFG 1 of their Ringside cards. When you have no Ring maneuvers, your opponent cannot play 'Reach' reversals to your non-Multi printed D: 8- Volley maneuvers. When played as a Counter, ignore the 'can only be played...' in the text of your printed Volley High Risks, and your opponent may ignore all reversal restrictions to it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: Faction, or you are a Stable. No player can play non-Superstar-specific Run-in cards without their Faction's title in the text, or move RFG cards with non-Superstar-specific effects (except cards with 'Million' in the text). When you are a NXT or WCW Superstar, your opponent cannot discard more than 2 cards when activating Sustained damage.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: Heat. Cannot be blanked. Your printed Heat maneuvers are +2D. Replace 'discard' with 'reveal' in the text of your Leave Me Alone, do not RFG Heat cards for Headstrong, you are considered to have lower Fortitude for I Already Warned You, and when you have 10+ lower Fortitude, Revolving Takedown can also reverse a non-Unique maneuver.

card.name: Almost Only Counts in Horseshoes and Hand Grenades

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing San Diego, California, and can only be played when Pinpoint Precision Offense is revealed. Cannot be blanked. Your 'Precision' Backlash cards do not take up Ring slots and can be played from Ringside. Your 'Precision' maneuvers are +2D, and when they are successful, put 1- Ringside Backlash cards into your Backlash. Your opponent cannot play Hybrid cards to your 'Precision' actions.

card.name: NXT Womens Tag Team Title Belts

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Female Superstar. Your Mid-match Capacity is +1. Before the first Draw Segment, you may Bury 2- Hand cards and draw that many. When you are Dakota Kai, Ember Moon, or IYO SKY, your opponent cannot prevent you from playing this card. Superstar Value +0

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be packed by Tag Teams. Cannot be packed when packing other 'ECW' Title Belts. Your maneuvers are +1D, and when The House That Hardcore Built is revealed, your Hand Size is +1. Superstar Value +0

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Cannot be packed with Precision Haymaker. Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. When you would move Hand cards for your opponent's Wrestlemania, you may move up to that many cards instead. No player can play Hybrid reversals (except Sidewalk Slam) to their opponent's maneuvers when they have 17+ Hand cards, or win the game when their opponent has 30+ Arsenal cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Can be played during the Venue phase. Congratulations, you are now enrolled at Chase University. Your School Boy can only be reversed from Arsenal, and replace '3' with '5' in its text. Your Team Spirit cannot be reversed. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may overturn 2 cards, and then your opponent plays with their hand revealed until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when Pinpoint Precision Offense is revealed. When you have 15F+ lower Fortitude and no Ring maneuvers this card is Multi and can only be reversed by Superstar-specific D: 0 cards. When played, you may discard 3- 'Precision' Backlash cards from your Backlash and/or Ring. This card is -10F for each card discarded. If you do not discard, this card is +10D and a TMF instead

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Enrolled at Chase University. Arsenal Search 6- non-Unique cards and then randomly Bury 3 Hand cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. Can only be played after a successful maneuver. When successful and you are The Rock, opponent skips their next turn. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. Can only be played after a successful maneuver. When successful and you are Harley Race, overturn 2 cards and opponent discards 4 cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Michael Tarver, opponent discards 1 Backlash card. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are The Nature Boy, Ringside Search 1- non-Unique maneuvers. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Tajiri, your next maneuver played this turn is -5F. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Lex Luger, opponent overturns 2 cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Lita, opponent Buries 2 Hand cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Raw Guest Host, draw 2- cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are The Immortal One, opponent discards 3 cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Hacksaw Jim Duggan, put 3- Ringside Mid-match cards into your Backlash. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Shawn Michaels, Arsenal Search 1 TMF. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by Gail Kim, or when packing The Era of the Superstar. Can be packed as if it is not Multi. When you are Gail Kim, this card is +7F, +7D, Gail Kim-specific, SmackDown, and a TMF instead. Your opponent discards cards equal to your Ring cards with 'The Era of the Superstar' in the text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Ricky 'The Dragon' Steamboat, RFG 1- of your opponent's Ringside cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Santino Marella, Arsenal Search 1 non-Unique non-maneuver. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are The British Bulldog, put 1- RFG Mid-match into your Backlash. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Batista, Recover 2- Ringside cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Rick Rude, opponent RFG 1 Hand card. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Diesel, this card is +1 Stun. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Roderick Strong, Promo: 2. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Keith Lee, put 1- non-Unique cards from opponent's Ring into their Ringside. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are The Beast Incarnate, opponent overturns 3 cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are The Lionheart, opponent reveals 1 random Backlash card, you may RFG 1 Hand card and then they discard that card. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Bret 'The Hitman' Hart, opponent cannot play non-maneuver cards on their next turn. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are The Great Khali, draw 1- cards and opponent discards 1 card. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are The Rowdy One, draw 2- cards and Recover 2- Ringside cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Daniel Bryan, Bury 2- non-'Divine' RFG cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Darren Young, Recover 3- Ringside cards and opponent RFG 3 random Ringside cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Andre the Giant, RFG Search 2- cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are The Highlight of the Night, opponent discards random Backlash cards until they discard either a reversal, a Superstar-specific, or 3 Mid-match cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if non-Unique. When successful and you are Razor Ramon, opponent discards 2 and overturns 4 cards. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have 5+ Ring 'Textbook' maneuvers. When you have lower Fortitude, non-F: 0 reversals to this card are +1F for each 'Textbook' card in your Ringside.

card.name: You Couldn't Hit the Broad Side of a Barn!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Pinpoint Precision Offense is revealed. When played from hand, reverse any non-Unique card. Bury 1- RFG cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Enrolled at Chase University. Reverse any card with 'Text' in the text, or when played from hand, completely reverse any Multi card, or any card with a title already in any player's Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed when packing Textbook Offense. This card ignores reversal restrictions from your opponent's card, and can be played as if it is Hybrid. Reverse any card that 'cannot be reversed', or any non-Unique maneuver with a reversal restriction from your opponent's card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is considered Superstar-specific for your opponent's effects. When this card reverses from Arsenal, it is considered 2 reversal cards, and put it into your Ring instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card reverses from Hand, Recover 5- Ringside cards. When this card reverses from Arsenal, put it into your Ring. ACE: During your turn, when this card is in your Ring, you may RFG this card and then all players Ring / RFG Search 1- non-reversal TMF.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, Recover this card and 1 non-Unique RFG card. As a reversal, when overturned, reverse any non-damage card effect and Recover this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Bury any number of RFG 'Precision' cards and Arsenal Search 1 'Precision' maneuver without 'reversed' in the text. When this card is in your Ring and you have 10+ printed 'Precision' Ring maneuvers, you win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Enrolled at Chase University. Arsenal Search 1 non-Superstar-specific maneuver. If it is your next card played this turn, choose 1: It is Multi, it is Chain, or it cannot be reversed from Backlash. When you are a NXT Superstar, you may choose 2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You can pack Roman Reigns, The Tribal Chief, and/or The Usos-specific Arsenal maneuvers (they are not Volley), Roman's Spear, Acknowledge Me, Backed by Paul Heyman, and A Family Legacy (it gains your logo). You are a Tag Team.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be played during any Pre-match phase. Cannot be blanked. When your opponent plays a Universally Unique card, you may reveal 1 Backlash card with the same title, put it into your Ring, and they put their card into their Backlash (ignoring the Permanent trait). You may choose to have them resolve first at the end of the Pre-match phase, and you choose the order they resolve their effects in during the Pre-match phase. When you are The Bloodline and your non-Chain maneuver is unsuccessful, your opponent may discard 1 card (2 cards if the maneuver is Superstar-specific); if they do not, they draw 2 and skip their next turn (regardless of Old School Wrestling Match).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed by 1 reversal card. When this card is completely reversed, you may put it into your hand. Draw 1- cards, Stack 1- Ringside cards, Bury 1- RFG cards. When you are The Usos, double those numbers. They discard 1 card, Bury 1 Hand card, Stack 1 Hand card, RFG 1 Ringside card, and overturn 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is +#F (# = your opponent's printed Superstar Value). When you are Paul Heyman, this card is blank unless The Tribal Chief is your enforcer. Your opponent plays with their hand revealed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your non-Chain maneuver is unsuccessful, you may RFG it, and then Recover 3- Ringside cards. You can play RFG 'Samoan' maneuvers as if from hand. Your non-Superstar-specific effects (except Sustained damage) cannot reduce the damage of your opponent's maneuvers. You can pack A Family Legacy, The Samoan Spike, and The Samoan Scream.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: During your turn, when you play a non-Volley non-RMS maneuver without 'victory' in the text, you may hide this card and if your maneuver is unsuccessful, you may resolve its text as if it was successful. If the maneuver is successful, it is blank until the end of the turn. When this card is hidden, and your opponent successfully plays a maneuver, you may reveal this card and then their maneuver is -3D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent's effects cannot reduce your Hand Size. Your maneuvers are +3D. During your turn, you may hide this card and then RFG 1 of your Ring maneuvers.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Your opponent's reversals deal a maximum of 1D. When you have 5+ lower Fortitude, your maneuvers are considered to have 'Samoan' in the title. ACE: During your turn you can RFG this card and then your next 'Samoan' maneuver this turn cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, -10F. When this card is in your Ring, and your opponent's maneuver is unsuccessful, they choose 1: They RFG 1 Hand card, or they RFG the reversed maneuver. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, they choose both.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have lower Fortitude, this card is a High Risk instead. When successful, opponent discards 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful card. When played after Throw Into The Corner Turnbuckle, your opponent's reversals to this card are +12F, and when you are Umaga, can only be reversed by 2 reversal cards. RFG 2- of your opponent's Ring cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have F: 30+, this card is a TMF instead. Can only be played after a successful maneuver. When played after a 'Samoan' maneuver, cannot be reversed from Hand. During your turn, you can reveal this card from your hand, Recover it, and your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -20F, can only be reversed from Arsenal or by D: 0 cards. As a reversal, can only be played from RFG, reverse any non-maneuver, or card played after From the Top Rope.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent's Superstar Value is 2-, they cannot respond to this card. When this card is in your Ring, their cards are -1D and -1 Stun, and when they play an action, they may discard 1 card or their action's text is blank until the end of the turn.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Solo Sikoa, The Tribal Chief, The Usos, The Great Liberator, The Bloodline

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 2: Draw 4, Recover 4 RFG cards, Recover 4 Ringside cards, or opponent discards 4. When you are The Usos, you choose only 1 of these effects, but they are all +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an Action, Recover this card, and your next maneuver this turn cannot be reversed from Backlash. As a reversal, when overturned, reverse any non-damage card effect (even during the Pre-match phase), or any non-Unique card, put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent does not search their Arsenal for the effects of their BASH cards, and when their Face or Heel card is successful, choose 1: they overturn # cards, you Recover # Ringside cards, or you Promo: # (# = their number of Ring cards with that trait, max. 5). You cannot pack Newcastle, England. You can pack maneuvers with the Finn Balor, Rhea Ripley, Damian Priest, and/or Dominik Mysterio logos. You are a Tag Team.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: The Judgment Day, The Rated R Superstar

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have lower Fortitude, this card is -5F. Unless you are The Rated R Superstar, discard 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put all other cards in all players' Rings into their Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Completely reverse any non-maneuver card, any ACE, or, when overturned, any non-damage card effect. When this card is in your Ring, it is considered in your Ringside for your Ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your 'Precision' and 'Shoot' maneuvers are not Cheater, and are considered to have 'Precision' and 'Shoot' in the title for your non-reversal effects. When you play a printed 'Precision' maneuver, you may increase the number of cards you move with that card's effect by +1. Your F: 0 'Precision' maneuvers are Multi, and when you have lower Fortitude, ignore 'completely' on your opponent's reversals to that card. Your Pinpoint Precision Offense is always revealed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Arsenal Search 10- 'Shoot' maneuvers and put them under this card. Your opponent cannot search your Arsenal for their effects before the first turn of the game. Twice during each of your turns you may play a maneuver under this card as if from hand. When you have lower Fortitude and your maneuver is unsuccessful, put 1- Ringside non-RMS 'Precision' maneuvers under this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. At the end of the Pre-match phase, Recover any number of Hand cards and draw that many. When they have greater Hand cards and their non-reversal is successful, they Bury 1 Hand card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a maneuver, you may put 3 cards from under The Archer of Infamy into your Ringside. If you do, can only be reversed from Arsenal. As a reversal, ignore any reversal restriction from a card, reverse any 'Plex' card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, overturn 5- cards, and this card is -2F for each overturned card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have F: 30+, this card is a TMF instead. When this card is in your Ring, your opponent cannot move their RFG cards to any other location.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed from Backlash. During your turn when this card is in your hand or Ringside, you may reveal it, Bury it, and when your next card played this turn is an action, it cannot be reversed from hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed by Hybrid cards. Recover this and 3- Ringside cards.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Damian Priest, Rated R Superstar, Rhea Ripley, Finn Balor, Dominik Mysterio, The Judgment Day

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 1 card in your opponent's Ring and put it into your Ring (it cannot be moved from your Ring by other effects). At the end of your turn, put that card into their Ring and Recover this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Opponent discards and overturns cards equal to the number of reversals in their Ring.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Damian Priest, Rated R Superstar, Rhea Ripley, Finn Balor

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when your opponent's card becomes successful. They put that card into their hand instead, the card is considered to have not been played, and end their turn. When You Think You Know Me is in your Ring, they discard that card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent plays a maneuver, you may reveal 1 applicable reversal from your hand (ignoring reversal and play restrictions). If you do, Recover it and either 1 Ringside card or 3- random Ringside cards, and their maneuver becomes successful. You can pack High-Flying Style and The Three Amigos, but you cannot pack No Matching Tights.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have lower Fortitude and your opponent's maneuver becomes successful, they may discard 1 card. If they do not, after damage is applied, end the turn. Your second High Risk played each turn cannot be reversed. Once during each of your turns, you may RFG 1 of your Ring maneuvers and then they Bury 1 Hand card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. When you have 5+ lower Fortitude, your printed 4D+ maneuvers are High Risks instead. ACE: When your opponent plays a maneuver, you may RFG this card to reduce that maneuver's damage to 0. ACE: Once per turn, when you are The Judgment Day and your opponent's Superstar-specific card becomes successful, you may put 1 of your non-Active non-RMS D: 1+ Ring cards into your Ringside, and then their card is considered Face and Heel for your Ability. This effect cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful maneuver. End your opponent's turn. When the card revealed for your Ability is Unique, they overturn 2 cards.

card.name: The First Father and Son WWE Tag Team Champions

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card and you are Rey Mysterio, you can pack 3 additional Mid-match cards. When you have lower Fortitude, this card is -8F. Cannot be reversed. Ringside Search 2 cards. When those cards have the same title and are 1 Throwback and 1 non-Throwback, Arsenal Search 2- cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successful as a maneuver, Recover this card and your opponent overturns 4 cards. When played from your hand, reverse any Strike or Grapple. When overturned, reverse any Submission or High Risk.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent is a Male Superstar, this card is Multi and can only be reversed from Arsenal. As a reversal, -5F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played as a Counter or after a successful maneuver. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, this card is -6F and can only be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful maneuver or as a Counter. When this card is a High Risk, cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is moved to your Arsenal from Ringside or for your Ability, RFG 3 Ringside cards. When this card is in your Ring, replace 'Maneuver' in your Ability with 'Card'.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 1 card in your opponent's Ring, and Recover Ringside and/or RFG cards up to the damage of the chosen card. When this card is in your Ring, the chosen card is blank.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring, no player can move Ringside cards except by their Ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After damage is applied from your opponent's maneuver or D: 3+ reversal, RFG any number of Ringside cards overturned for damage, and then Recover half that many Ringside cards or half that many random RFG cards (rounded up). You can pack I'm a Role Model!, and Bayley, Dakota Kai and IYO SKY-specific maneuvers as if they are not Multi. You cannot pack Baghdad, Iraq. You are a Tag Team.

card.name: We Got The Power, We Got The Rage

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card, you can pack 3- Out of Control in your Backstage. When this card is revealed, put them into your Backlash, replace 'Can only be played' with 'Cannot be reversed' in their text, and they are not Active. When you play a 'CTRL' or 'Control' card you may Promo: 2. If successful, after damage is applied, you may flip that card face down and your opponent randomly Buries 1 Hand card.

card.name: CTRL The Stage, CTRL The Cage

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Your opponent's Stipulation is blank. No player may win the game via non-Superstar-specific card effect. You also count as Bayley for your Title Belts. When your maneuver without a reversal restriction from your card is unsuccessful, Flip 1- of your face-down Ring cards face-up.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, can only be reversed by 1 reversal card. ACE: When this card is Flipped face-up you may Bury this card, and then Bury 2- Ringside cards and 3- Hand cards, and draw cards up to the number of Hand cards you Buried.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your actions are considered to be Cheater for your effects. Twice during your turn, when your action is successful, you may Promo: 2. Once during each of your turns, when you Promo, Bury 1- cards not chosen. You can pack Cheater cards when packing Fan Favorite cards, and Bayley-specific Arsenal cards (except I'm A Hugger) as if they are not Multi (they are not NXT). Your Cheater and Fan Favorite cards are considered to be both Cheater and Fan Favorite for your effects.

card.name: Longest Reigning SmackDown Women's Champion In History!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked and does not take up a slot in your Ring. After all Pre-match phases, you may put Smackdown Women's Championship Belt from your Backlash into your Ring. Your Fortitude is +1 for each of your printed non-Pre-match Ring Cheater cards. Your Mid-match actions do not take up Ring slots. Your actions are also considered maneuvers for their Stipulations.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Bayley, this card is NXT. Can only be played after a successful D: 1+ card. Blank that card, it is reduced to 1D, and cannot be reversed from your Arsenal. End your opponent's turn. When played by The Role Model, after damage has been applied, Arsenal Search 1 non-Unique action.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, F: 0; discard this card to completely reverse any non-Superstar-specific card or an effect with 'win the game' or 'lose the game' in the text (your opponent cannot respond to this.)

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may Flip 1 card in your Ring face-down, reveal your top 5 Arsenal cards, put 1 revealed non-reversal card into your hand and Stack the remaining cards or shuffle. You can pack Multi 'Kick' maneuvers. You cannot pack Baghdad, Iraq.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Replace a Superstar on WWE Women's Tag Team Title Belts with 'Dakota Kai'. When you have equal or lower Fortitude, your opponent cannot play Hybrid or Backlash reversals with 'reverse' in the text to your first 'Kick' maneuver each turn. When played as a Counter, ignore 'can only be played...' in the text of your 'Kick' maneuvers.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Your 'Boot' maneuvers are considered to have 'Kick' in the title. Once during each of your turns, when you have 4- Hand cards you may Arsenal Search 1 non-unique 'Kick' maneuver. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may RFG 1 Hand or Ringside 'Kick' maneuver, and then your opponent Buries 1 random Hand card. Do not discard for reversals to this ACE.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. Arsenal Search 1 non-unique 'Kick' maneuver and discard it. When you Flip a card, Bury 1- random Ringside cards. When your opponent's maneuver is reversed, Stack 1- non-reversal Ringside maneuvers.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful maneuver. Blank that maneuver's text and end your opponent's turn. Your opponent may skip their Draw Segment and discard 3 cards to put this card into your Ringside. ACE: When you play a maneuver, you may RFG any number of Ringside cards and your opponent's non-F: 0 reversals are +2F for each card removed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -6F. As a reversal, when you are Dakota Kai, ignore any reversal restriction from a card, reverse any non-Superstar-specific card played as a Counter.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful card. When this card would be Flipped face-down, first you may Stack 1- RFG maneuvers.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a 'Kick' maneuver, cannot be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successful as maneuver, if this card is not reversed from Arsenal, you win the game via Pinfall Victory. When successful as a reversal by Damage CTRL, discard this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is Flipped face-up, draw 1- cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Completely reverse any non-Superstar-specific non-maneuver card. When this card is in your Ring, and any player plays an action, they overturn 2 cards. When this card is in your Ring or Ringside, before your Draw Segment you may Recover it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have 10- Arsenal cards and F: 10- this card is F: 0, can be played from Ringside, and cannot be responded to. Bury 10- Ringside cards, Recover any number of Hand cards, and draw the same number you Recovered +1. When this card is Flipped face-up, Bury 2- non-'Divine' RFG cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Non-Superstar-specific effects cannot Flip your cards face-down. Once during each of your turns, when you would play a Set-up card from Hand, you may first Flip one of your Ring cards face-down and then ignore the 'can only be played...' text. When played, your Double Underhook Back Breaker cards are Multi and also High Risk. You can pack High-Flying Style. You cannot pack Lumberjack Match or Falls Count Anywhere Match.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card, you can pack 4 From the Middle Turnbuckle, 4 Springboard, and 4 From the Top Rope in your Backstage. At the end of the Pre-match phase put 1 of those cards into your hand, and Recover the rest. Your non-Backlash Set-ups are F: 0. Replace a Superstar on WWE Women's Tag Team Title Belts with 'IYO SKY'. During your turn, you may hide this card and Ringside Search 1 High Risk.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Can be played during the Venue phase. Your High Risk maneuvers are +1 Stun, and when unsuccessful, you may Recover them. Replace 'Strike' with 'High Risk' in the text of your Trash Can. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may Bury 1 Hand card, and then Recover 1 Ringside card, randomly RFG 1 of your opponent's Ringside cards, and RFG 1 of your face-down Ring cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successful, if you have 10+ face-down Ring cards you win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a 3D+ maneuver, or a Set-up card. When played after Springboard, -5F and cannot be reversed from Backlash. As a reversal, reverse any card played after a Set-up.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -9F, and can only be played after a successful card or as a Counter, and when successful, Bury any number of Hand cards and draw that many cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -15F, and after damage is applied, RFG 3- of your opponent's Ringside cards. As a reversal, ignore any reversal restrictions from the reversed card, reverse any non-Chain non-Superstar-specific maneuver with a printed reversal restriction.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -1F for each of your face-down Ring cards, and when you have 5+ face-down Ring cards, this card is a TMF instead. Flip 2- of your Ring cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -1F for each of your face-down Ring cards, and considered a High Risk for your card effects. Can only be played after a 5D+ maneuver. When unsuccessfully played by IYO SKY, your opponent RFG 2 Hand cards and their top 2 Arsenal cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be moved to Arsenal by Tokyo Shock or A Force You Can't Hope To CTRL. ACE: When this card is in your Ring, during your turn, you may RFG 2 of your face-down cards and then Recover this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have 5+ lower Fortitude, your opponent cannot respond to this card. Arsenal Search any printed non-Unique D: 8- High Risk, and when that is your next card played, it is F: 0, ignore its 'can only be played...' text, and if you have 10+ lower Fortitude, they cannot respond to it.

card.name: A Force You Can't Hope To CTRL

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Recover 2 of your other Ring cards. ACE: When this card is Flipped face-up, you may Flip 2 of your other Ring cards, and then RFG this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you end your turn without attempting to play a maneuver, opponent can RFG 1- of your Ring cards. Your Old School Beating is Permanent, not Heel, and does not take up a Pre-match slot in your Ring. They overturn 2 cards when they play a maneuver. You can pack Sheamus and Pete Dunne-specific maneuvers. You are a Tag Team.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have no printed D: 1+ Pre-match Ring cards, your Fortitude is +1 for each of your Ring 'Brawl' and 'Beating' cards. Your Ready to Fight ACE cannot be reversed (those cards do not take up Ring slots). When your opponent's maneuver is successful, you may Backlash / Ringside Search 1 Ready to Fight and put it into your Ring (when you have 10+ lower Fortitude, into your Backlash instead).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot prevent this card from being played. Can be played during any Pre-match phase. You can play maneuvers in your Backstage, ignoring the Volley Trait, and they may ignore reversal restrictions from Hand and Arsenal to it. ACE: When they play a maneuver, you may Bury your hand, draw that many -1, and then put 1 of your non-RMS non-reversal Ring maneuvers into your Backstage.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful card. After damage is applied, end your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ring, all maneuvers are +1D for every Ring maneuver. When your opponent plays a maneuver with a reversal restriction from his effect, it is -1D for each of their Ring maneuvers.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent plays with their hand and Backlash revealed. Before each of their Draw Segments, you may choose 1 maneuver or action in their hand with Fortitude equal to or less than their Fortitude. If you do and their turn ends without attempting to play a card with that title, they may discard it. If they do not, choose 1: Bury 2- Ringside cards, or they overturn 2 cards. You can pack Seth Rollins Arsenal cards, and Sling Blade, but you cannot pack Raw or Smackdown Managers.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you choose cards in your opponent's hand for your card effect, choose 1 additional card. During any turn, when your Raw card is successful, they overturn 1 card (this cannot be reversed). When a non-damage card effect they control moves any number of cards to or from your Ringside, they overturn that many cards (Max. 5). Your Superstar-specific cards are Raw, and they cannot play reversals to your non-Run-in Raw ACE.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot look at your hand. When their non-Superstar-specific effect would choose cards in your hand, you choose instead, and choose 1 less card. During any turn, when your Smackdown card is successful, Bury 1- Ringside cards. When your card is unsuccessful, you may put 1 Hand card under this card, Arsenal Search 1 non-Unique non-reversal card (when you have lower Fortitude, any non-Unique card), then randomly Bury 1 Hand card. You can play cards from under this card as if from Hand. Your Superstar-specific cards are Smackdown, and your opponent cannot play reversals to your Smackdown ACE.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed with Elimination Chamber. Can be played during any Pre-match phase. Your Mid-match cards with the same brand as your Allegiance do not take up Ring slots. Until the first turn of the game, your opponent cannot blank your non-Stipulation Pre-match cards with non-'Shenanigans' effects, move cards from your Hand or Backlash, or reduce your Hand Size, and their non-Superstar-specific card effects do not increase their Hand Size or let them draw more than 2 cards. Your turns cannot be skipped, and their non-Reversal cards do not end your turn. You start the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may Flip 1 of your Ring cards. When you Flip your card face-up, you may draw 1- cards, and when it is not a non-Hybrid Reversal, you may Recover it. When the Recovered card had 'Rolling' in the title, draw 1- cards. Your 'Rolling' maneuvers are +1 Stun. You can pack Standing Moonsault. You cannot pack Baghdad, Iraq.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Ignore your opponent's card effects that would allow them to look at your hand or Backlash, search your Arsenal, or reveal any cards from those areas. When you would discard Hand cards for your effects, you may Bury half of those cards (rounded down). Once during each of your turns you may RFG 2 Ringside cards and then Arsenal Search 1 card with the same title as one of those cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be played during any Pre-match phase. When packing this card, your non-Throwback In The Interest of Fairness... are not Heel, do not take up Ring slots, and your opponent draws 1 fewer card for its effect. When played, Backlash Search 1- 'McMahon' Pre-match cards and put it into your Ring. Your 'McMahon' cards cannot be blanked. Arsenal Search Throwback Don't Cross the Boss and put it into your Ring (it is Permanent).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent's effect reduces your Hand Size, their Hand Size is also reduced by that many. No player can play cards with the same title as a face-down card in your Ring. When they play a card with the same title as a card in your Ring, you may Bury 1 Ringside card. You can play Rolling Takedown as if your opponent's played card is a Grapple maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have fewer Hand or Arsenal cards. Cannot be reversed. When this card is in your Ring, your maneuvers are +#D, where # is the difference between your number of Hand cards and your opponent's (max. 5).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a Counter and you have 5+ lower Fortitude, cannot be reversed from Hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -3F. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, can only be reversed from Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any Hybrid maneuver. When the reversed maneuver has 'Dynamic' in the title, RFG it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, -25F, Recover this card and then Ring Search 1 face-down card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played from Hand by Austin Theory, reverse any non-Superstar-specific maneuver. When played from Hand by The Genetic Jackhammer, reverse any blank card. When your opponent has a Stone Cold Steve Austin-specific Ring card, instead reverse any card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successful, you may discard 2 cards. If you do, your first card played on your next turn cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: ACE: When this card is in your Ring, once during each of your turns you may Flip 1 card in your Ring face-down, and then discard 1 card. When this effect is reversed, Ringside Search 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is Flipped face-up, Recover 1- Ringside cards and Flip this card face-down.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once per turn, when you play a Unique reversal, you may Bury 1 non-'Divine' RFG card. You can pack No Sell Maneuver and up to 2 copies of Unique Arsenal reversals. You cannot play Unique non-reversals with a title already in your Ring, or pack Egomaniacal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your non-Hybrid non-Backlash Unique reversals, and your 'Suplex' maneuvers are -1F for each of your RFG cards. During your opponent's turn, when you would discard, you may instead RFG that many Ringside cards. When they have 40+ RFG cards, you win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Your opponent cannot prevent you from playing this card. Can be played from Ringside. Before every Draw Segment, all players RFG their top Arsenal card. Their cards overturned for your non-damage effects is reduced to 0. ACE: During your turn, you may RFG this card and then Recover 10- RFG cards. When you have 10- Arsenal cards or 20+ lower Fortitude, this effect cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand and choose 2 cards. They discard 1 and RFG the other. When this card is in your Ringside, your maneuvers are +3D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have F: 30+, this card is Multi, +5D, and a TMF instead; and when you have 30+ RFG cards, can only be reversed by 2 reversal cards from Arsenal. As a Grapple, when this card is unsuccessful, you may put it into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -20F, look at your opponent's top 3 Arsenal cards, RFG 1 of them and Bury the rest. As a reversal, reverse any Chain, Heat, Volley, or BASH card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is also considered a Submission for your effects. When played after a 'Suplex' maneuver, cannot be reversed from Arsenal. Bury 1 RFG card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card reverses from Arsenal, put it into your Ring. Your opponent RFG 1 additional card for Managed by Scarlett. During their turn, when this card is in your Ring, they may RFG 2 Hand cards to RFG this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent may discard 3 cards. If they do not, Bury 5- RFG cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Recover RFG cards equal to the number of your opponent's Unique Ring cards. When this card is in your Ring, opponent must RFG 1 Hand card to play Face or Heel cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when Tick Tock... is in your Ring. ACE: During your opponent's turn, you may RFG your top 3 Arsenal cards to reverse any maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Grapples are +3D and +1 Stun. During your turn, when your NXT card is successful, you may Promo: 2. You can pack No Sell Maneuver, Beware of Dog, The Frankensteiner, The Steinerline, and non-Throwback Steiner Recliner (they are NXT instead), and your 'Military' and 'Press' Grapples are Unique, Multi, NXT instead, and also TMF, but they are not Heat, Cheater, or Raw.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you can choose to also count as either The Steiner Brothers or Big Poppa Pump for your effects until the end of the turn. When your opponent plays a Multi card, you can put this card from Backstage into your Ring, and then that card is not Multi. ACE: When this card is in your Ring, you can put it into your Ringside, and then Recover 5- Ringside cards. When you have 10- Arsenal cards this effect cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Your opponent's maneuvers are -2D. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, you can play Superstar-specific maneuvers from Ringside. ACE: When you have F: 15+, you may put this card into your Ringside to completely reverse any non-TMF maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. At the end of the Pre-match phase, look at your opponent's hand and Backlash, then Arsenal Search 1 non-Unique non-reversal Grapple. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may discard any number of cards, and then if your next card played is a Grapple, it is -4F for each card discarded.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent's maneuver is successful, and they have 5+ greater Fortitude, you may put this card from your Backlash into your Ring. When successful, Bury 2- Ringside cards, and then Arsenal Search 2- Grapple maneuvers. When your turn begins with this card in your Ring, your opponent cannot play reversals to your Activated Card Effects. During their turn, they may discard 4 cards and overturn 4 cards to RFG this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are The Steiner Brothers this card is WCW instead. When played as a Counter (Arsenal), and you have lower Fortitude, your opponent cannot play non-Unique reversals to this card. Reverse any maneuver played after a Set-up or any High Risk.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be searched for as if non-Unique. When played as a Counter, cannot be reversed from Backlash. Bury 4- Ringside cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a Counter, can only be reversed from Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring, no player can move RFG cards to any other location. During your opponent's turn, when this card is in your Ring, they may overturn 5 cards, and then you Bury this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 2- cards. Do not discard for your No Sell Maneuver cards.

card.name: You Want A Friend? Get A Dog!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-Superstar-specific non-maneuver or ACE. When this card is in your Ring, opponent must discard 1 card to Activate an ACE.

card.name: Do You Want The Bark or The Bite

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed by 2 reversal cards. Your opponent may discard # cards and overturn # card. If they do not, Bury #- Ringside cards, and draw #- cards. # = the number of your Ring grapples.

card.name: Throw You Around Like A Rag Doll!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, this card is F: 0 and your opponent cannot respond to it. Your opponent cannot play reversals to your non-Unique Grapples for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card, you cannot pack more than 1 World Tour '05, and you may pack Chris Jericho-specific Mid-match cards in your Backstage. They do not take up Ring slots. When your Chris Jericho-specific card is successful, you may put 1 Ringside / Backstage Superstar-specific Mid-match card into your Backlash. At the end of the Pre-match phase, Bury 3- Hand cards and draw that many.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed with There is No Escape. Backlash Search I Did It For You and Raisin' the Roof and put them into your Ring. They are Permanent and cannot be blanked. Your opponent cannot reverse your Rikishi-specific actions from hand, and when Drive Rikishi, Drive is successful, they overturn 6 cards. During your turn, you may hide this card and then Recover 3- Ring / Ringside / RFG Getting Cheeky With It (this cannot be prevented).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful maneuver, or as a Counter. Put 1 Ringside card into your Hand (or Backlash, if applicable). When this card is in your Ring and you have 5+ Rikishi-specific Ring maneuvers, your Ass Drop cannot be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card you can pack The New Legends of the WWE, Kane maneuvers, and either Undertaker or Deadman Inc. maneuvers. When playing a Superstar-specific maneuver, you may blank the text until the end of the turn. When the first card played on your turn is a TMF, you may immediately play another TMF with it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by Lita. When packing this card, your 'Lita' cards are Superstar-specific, and cannot be prevented from being played (except by 'Shenanigans' cards). Your opponent cannot play non-Superstar-specific 'Lita' cards, and your Superstar-specific Backlash cards do not take up Ring slots. After all Pre-match phases, before the first turn, blank 1- of their 'Rules' or Stipulation Ring cards. Your Ability gains: 'Your 'Drop Kick' and 'Dropkick' Strikes are Volley: 4, and cannot be reversed by the Volley trait. Your I Waited Long Enough can only be reversed by the Volley trait, and its Volley: # is Max. 20.'

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by Trish Stratus. Your Superstar-specific Backlash cards do not take up Ring slots. At the end of the Pre-match, you may play 100% Stratusfaction Guaranteed and 1 Enter The Stratus-phere regardless of Fortitude (cards with those titles are Superstar-specific, and Permanent when you have no other cards with those titles in your Ring). When your opponent reverses the ACE of Enter the Stratus-phere, your turn does not end but you cannot Activate cards with that title for the rest of the turn. When you have lower Fortitude and your action is unsuccessful, look at their hand. You may choose 1 card: they RFG it or they randomly discard a Backlash card. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, they do both.

card.name: It's Time to Rock and Roll!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by Trish Stratus. When this card is discarded for a Superstar-specific ACE, draw 1- card, your opponent cannot play reversals to the ACE, and their overturn effect can only be reversed by Booby Trap. Once during each of your turns, when you successfully Activate a Superstar-specific card, you may Ringside/RFG Search this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card you can pack Standing Moonsault and Dance Break!. Ignore 'non-Unique' in the text of your other Victoria-specific cards, they can be packed as if they are not Cheater or Fan Favorite, when they are non-Unique they are F: 0, and their ACE cannot be reversed. When they are in Ringside, replace '1' with '2' in their text. Your Mind Games counts as Battling The Voices for your effects. When Diva Bikini Contest is in your Ring, replace 'Ringside' with 'Ring or Ringside' in the text of Widow's Peak.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played as a Counter (Hand). Promo: 5, and then Bury this card and 3- Ringside cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card you can pack Jillian Hall: The Fixer, and Drawing a Blank. Cannot be blanked. Your Pre-match Capacity is +3. Once during each of your turns you may overturn 10- cards. Your Fortitude is +1 for each card overturned for this effect until the end of your turn, but you cannot play JBL's Clothesline From Hell this turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card, your Interviewed by Mean Gene Okerlund and cards listed in its text are WCW. Your Title Belt and Superstar-specific cards do not take up Ring slots, and when you would discard for their effects, you may Bury that many Hand cards instead. For every Title Belt in a Ring (max. 4), your maneuvers are +2D and +1 Stun. They cannot gain Stun from other effects. When your opponent's turn ends without playing a maneuver, Ringside Search 1 Strike. When that is the first card played on your turn, it is a Multi High Risk instead, and their successful reversals are blank and deal no damage.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed with The YES! Lock or The No! Lock. As a maneuver, if your next card played is Maintain Hold, ignore the 'can only be played...' text, and your opponent cannot respond to it. Reverse any card that does not resolve to your opponent's Ring.

card.name: I Got A Lot Left In The Tank!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: *Reveal this card when you are about to lose the game. Recover 10- Ringside cards, 2- RFG cards, end the current turn, and the game continues. Your first 10D+ maneuver each turn is Multi.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successful, your opponent overturns 10 cards (if played as a maneuver, 20 cards instead.) This cannot be reversed, reduced, or prevented.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card, you can pack Enough is Enough, It's Time for a Change, I Am Not a Nugget!, and non-Hybrid Owen Hart-specific maneuvers. Ignore 'The card...card.' text on your Cross Body Block. Your opponent counts as The Rattlesnake for your Owen's Tombstone Piledriver. During any turn, when you use your Ability and have greater Fortitude, you may hide another Superstar-specific Backstage card to ignore 'non-reversal' in your Ability. When you have 2+ hidden Nation of Domination-specific Backstage cards, your Superstar-specific maneuvers are Chain.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Your Superstar-specific cards are -#F and cannot be prevented from being played. (# = the total damage on Reversal cards in your opponent's Ring) When you play a maneuver after Irish Whip or Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle, you may reveal 1 Hand or Backlash reversal (except Restricted Use in This Area). If you do, your opponent cannot play the revealed card to your maneuver; if you do not, and your maneuver is unsuccessful, they reveal their hand.

card.name: Played to the Ring by Rick...BOOGS!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be played during any Pre-match phase. Cannot be blanked. Replace 'Backlash' in the text of The Artist Known as Shinsuke Nakamura with 'RFG, Backlash'. When you have lower Fortitude and you would draw for your Ability, you may instead make your opponent discard 2 cards, and when that maneuver is successful, they RFG cards overturned for the second damage application. When their effect moves any number of your Ring cards, you may move up to the same number of their Ring cards of the same type to their Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful non-Superstar-specific action (when you have lower Fortitude, any action). Blank that card's text and damage and end your opponent's turn. During your next turn, you may play that card as if from Hand (or Backlash, if applicable). If you do, after that card is resolved, put it into your opponent's Ringside instead of any other location.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is RFG for Watch Me Shine, put this card into your Hand. When this card is not Multi, your opponent cannot play Backlash reversals to it. When this card is Multi, it is +4D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful non-Superstar-specific maneuver, blank that maneuver's text and damage for the rest of the turn. End your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ring, your maneuvers are +1 Stun.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, when you are Charlotte, this card is a TMF instead. When you are Rhea Ripley, this card is Multi. As an action, discard this card, put 1 Ringside Mid-match card into your Backlash, and end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Your Pre-match Capacity is +2. When you have greater Fortitude or Hand cards, once during each of your turns you may Promo: 3. ACE: Once during each of your turns you may RFG 5 Ringside cards and then put 1 Ringside Pre-match Event into your Ring and end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -10F, and when you have F: 30+ this card is a TMF instead. ACE: When your opponent plays a maneuver you may RFG this card and then their maneuver is blank until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successful maneuver or as a Counter. When played after a maneuver, this card is Multi and ignore 'completely' in the text of your opponent's reversals to it. As an action, Bury this card and then Flip 1 non-Superstar-specific non-F: 0 card in any Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Cannot be packed with printed D: 1+ Pre-match cards. When One Man Gang is not revealed, your opponent's Hand Size is -3 and your Hand Size is -2. Your Fortitude is +1 for each Stun in your Ring. ACE: During your turn you may RFG this card and then your next maneuver played this turn is +3 Stun.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card you can pack Managed by Slick. When you are Akeem, reverse any card. When your opponent's maneuver is successful, you may put this card into your Ring. ACE: When this card is in your Ring, before damage has been applied from their successful card, you can discard any number of cards to reduce the damage by 2 for each card discarded.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When One Man Gang is revealed, can be played from RFG. When this card is in your Ring and you would draw for Stun, you may have your opponent overturn that many cards instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when One Man Gang is not revealed. Recover Ringside cards up to the total Stun in all Rings. When you would draw 3+ cards for Stun, you may instead Recover this card from your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This deck may only contain Managed by 'Classy' Freddy Blassie, Managed by J.J. Dillon, Managed by Mr. Fuji (it is not Cheater), Legendary Management, Managed by Slick, and Managed by Kim Chee but you may not pack Manager cards in your Backlash. When you reveal your Superstar card, put 1 card in this deck on top of this card; once during each of your turns, when there are no cards on top of this deck you may put 1 card in this deck on top of this card. The card on top of this card is considered to be in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent's non-Superstar-specific effect would let them look at your hand or Backlash, they instead do not. During their turn, when they play a card, you may hide this card, Bury any number of Hand cards, and draw that many.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent's maneuvers are -1 Stun. During your turn, when this card is in your Ringside, you may RFG it and then Recover 5 Ringside cards. ACE: When they play a maneuver, you may put this card into your Ringside and then Arsenal Search 1 Over Sell Maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Recover 4- Ringside cards. When this card is in your Ring and your opponents action is successful, put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after damage is applied from your opponent's maneuver. They put their top # Arsenal cards into their Ringside (# = the maneuver's printed damage, max. 8). End their turn. ACE: During your turn, you may Recover 8- Ringside cards, and then RFG this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot play Hybrid reversals to this card. When you have 5+ lower Fortitude, this card is an action instead and -7F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played as a Counter. Ignore 'completely' in the text of your opponent's reversals to this card. Put your bottom 2 Arsenal cards into your hand and then Stack 2 Hand cards. This card can be reversed from Arsenal as if it is a TMF. If this card is completely reversed from Arsenal, draw 2- cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Promo: # and Bury any cards not chosen (# = the reversed maneuver's damage). Then choose 1 card in your opponent's Ringside and they Stack it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed with other Title Belts, but you can pack Punch regardless of logo. Cannot be blanked or prevented from being played. Can be played from Ringside. Each turn, your first maneuver played from under Back to Basics is +3D, and can only be reversed from Arsenal, or by printed F: 0 or Unique Hand or Backlash reversals. When it is unsuccessful and you have 10+ lower Fortitude, your opponent overturns cards equal to the number of their Ring reversals minus the number of your Ring maneuvers. When Back to Basics is not in your Ring, Arsenal Search any number of non-TMF Superstar-specific maneuvers and put them under this card; you may play them from under this card as if from Hand, and when you would Bury non-TMF cards for The Italian Strongman, you can put them under this card instead. Superstar Value +2

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful maneuver. Blank that maneuver's text and damage and end your opponent's turn. ACE: When this card is in your Ring and you play a maneuver, you can Bury any number of cards from under Back to Basics or WWWF Heavyweight Championship and your maneuver is +2D for each Buried card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, +20F, reverse any non-Unique non-Throwback maneuver, or any Non-Superstar-specific 'Arm' card. When successful, look at your opponent's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When Madison Square Garden, New York City is in your Ring, this card is F: 0, and when you have WWWF Heavyweight Championship in your Ring your opponent cannot respond to this card. Recover 7- Ringside cards and 8- RFG cards, and then draw 1- cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -1F for each maneuver in your Ring. Recover 8- Ringside cards and Ringside Search 2- maneuvers. ACE: Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card, and then name a non-Unique maneuver. This card also counts as that card until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -3F. As a reversal, -5D, reverse any non-maneuver card; when that card was Unique, draw 2 cards. This card is also counts as Roundhouse Kick for your effects.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -5F and when played as a Counter, cannot be reversed by D: 2+ cards. As a reversal, reverse any Submission, or completely reverse any 'Punch' card.
